titles: The prayer of Collonel Iohn Lambert in captivity. This prayer is not in Hebrew, but was translated out of the Greek by his chaplain for the Collonels own proper use.
author: Lambert, John, 1619-1683, attributed name.
notes: A satire; not in fact by Lambert.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
